products.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
products.metadescription: Day & night flecked grey
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Luna Softshade Slate Grey Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Luna softshade slate grey day and night blind in grey. Made to measure from 28.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This blind has a unique look that is sleek and stylish as well as highly practical for a modern living space. The luna softshade slate grey day and night roller blind can be easily adjusted to suit any time of day, the weather and your mood. It can be completely closed or open, or adjusted to the semi closed position with strips of voile between the solid slate grey fabric panels. This mode allows for an element of privacy with the benefit of natural light.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1865 fabric colour: slate grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Steel
products.metadescription: The day & night brushed steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. The gorgeous grey contrasts with the opaque stripes and gives this blind a unique feel. Combining brilliant light control with an
products.productdescription: The day & night brushed steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. The gorgeous grey contrasts with the opaque stripes and gives this blind a unique feel. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
